item.title: Box Office: ‘Freakier Friday’ and ‘Weapons’ Load Up for Late-Summer Showdown
item.description: Disney’s body swap sequel hopes to be another win for big screen comedies following ‘Naked Gun,’ while Zach Cregger’s acclaimed ‘Weapons’ hopes to reengage horror fans.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Freakier Friday’ and ‘Weapons’ Load Up for Late-Summer Showdown
item.description: Disney’s body swap sequel hopes to be another win for big screen comedies following ‘Naked Gun,’ while Zach Cregger’s acclaimed ‘Weapons’ hopes to reengage horror fans.

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan Struggle to Rekindle the Body-Swap Magic in Shrill “Freakquel”
item.description: Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons and Manny Jacinto also star in Nisha Ganatra’s comedy, which picks up with the characters based on Mary Rodgers’ classic children’s novel two decades later.

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan Struggle to Rekindle the Body-Swap Magic in Shrill “Freakquel”

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Lindsay Lohan and Jamie Lee Curtis Reunite for a Sequel That Kicks Up the Body-Swap Complications but Not the Comedy
item.description: The stage is set for an even wilder comedy than “Freaky Friday.” Yet somehow it doesn’t quite work out that way.

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Lindsay Lohan and Jamie Lee Curtis Reunite for a Sequel That Kicks Up the Body-Swap Complications but Not the Comedy

item.title: Julia Butters Gets Freaky (on a Friday)
item.description: When she was nine the actress was already stealing scenes from Leonardo DiCaprio. Now, at 16, she’s co-starring with Lindsay Lohan in Disney’s body-swapping sequel.

item.title: Jamie Lee Curtis Is “Prepping to Get Out” of Hollywood After Seeing Her Parents “Rejected” at a Certain Age
item.description: The Oscar winner says she’s “been self-retiring for 30 years.”
